 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Driver updateDriver(Driver driver)
        Method that checks if the driver arrived, if he picked up a rider or if is necessary to change the route
        Parameters:
        driver - driver that will be analyzed
        Returns:
        instance of the same driver with up to date data

        @POST

 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Rider updateRider(Rider rider)
        Method that checks if the rider is already inside a car
        Parameters:
        rider - instance of the rider to analyze
        Returns:
        the same instance with up to date data
